## Cooking Foods

Here is one my my favourite foods to cook ! its a filipino dish called
**Kaldereta**

It is a hearty meat dish using chevon (goat meat), beef, or pork
combined with potatoes, carrots, tomato sauce, and liver spread or liver
paste. This is a popular dish served during special occasions and a
regular in every Filipino cookbook.

### Ingredients

-   2 lbs beef
-   3 garlic cloves
-   1 onion
-   beef broth
-   red bell pepper
-   tomato sauce
-   live spread
-   chili flakes
-   potatoes
-   carrots
